title: HELP! In game colors all black!
body: I have an issue that I am at a loss with. I have repaired fully LoL and reinstalled all drivers for my graphics card, yet I still get this in game visual bug. When I minimize the game and re-open it, it looks normal for a few seconds then right back to this color issue. I have to close the game entirely and re-launch when in a match and SOMETIMES it will stay fixed but not always. Here is an in game screen shot of the issue. Any solution?

replies.body: Try running a quick repair if you haven't yet, since it looks like the HUD is displaying fine. Since the HUD is okay, that means this is most likely just some damaged game files. Hit me back up if that repair doesn't seem to help so we can try a couple other steps!

Scratch that, this has NOT fixed it. Late last night while I was playing it happened again. It seems if I leave the game on VERY LOW settings it will last awhile before it does it, however it is still not fixed and I can not play on Very High when my hardware should support it
I tried the repair and it did not work. I ended up reinstalling the entire game and it seems to have fixed it.

Hmm. From what I've noticed with other MMO's I've played, this happens when there's too much for the GPU to process all at once.  

 - Is this photo from a custom game?
 - What kind of graphics settings do you have League set on currently?
 - Have you tried lowering your graphics settings? It's possible that they are set on something higher than your PC can handle.

** - When was the last time you ran a Disk Cleanup (possibly) followed by a Disk Defragmenter?**
- Would you mind telling me your PC specs? (Specifically, Processor, Graphics Card, and RAM (memory)

 - Can you load a custom game up and hit Shift+CTRL+ESC (Task Manager) and click on over to the Performance tab? In the top left corner there should be a graph/gauge of CPU usage and Memory usage under CPU usage, what are the percentages at?
  **Side note: The locations I gave are for Windows 7 but should be relative for other Windows OS editions.  (Let me know if you're on MAC and I'll do my best to familiarize myself with their task manager if you're having trouble ^_^)
**

I hope I can help!
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

Is this photo from a custom game? **Yes however it does it in normal games too**
What kind of graphics settings do you have League set on currently? **Very high, I have always played with this setting since I have installed LoL YEARS ago and only now has it become a problem once I returned from a long break.**
Have you tried lowering your graphics settings? It's possible that they are set on something higher than your PC can handle. **I tried even setting them to low.**

When was the last time you ran a Disk Cleanup (possibly) followed by a Disk Defragmenter? **Never? guess I can try this :P**

Would you mind telling me your PC specs? (Specifically, Processor, Graphics Card, and RAM (memory) **AMD Ryzen 7, RX 580, 16gb RAM**

Can you load a custom game up and hit Shift+CTRL+ESC (Task Manager) and click on over to the Performance tab? In the top left corner there should be a graph/gauge of CPU usage and Memory usage under CPU usage, what are the percentages at? **19% CPU usage when in a custom game while memory usage is at 38%**
